Package net.xqhs.flash.core.support

Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility. Basic support implementations.
Author:
andreiolaru
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageReceiver
    This interface should be implemented by any entity which is able to receive messages from a support infrastructure (and, more concretely, from a Pylon).
    MessagingPylonProxy
    This interface should be implemented by any proxy to a Pylon that offers messaging services.
    MessagingShard
    Interface for any shard offering messaging functionality to an entity.
    Pylon
    This interface should be implemented by any persistent entity that exists on a Node and offers to agents services such as communication, mobility, directory, etc.
    PylonProxy
    Entity.EntityProxy for a Pylon, specifying the only one required method, for retrieving the recommended implementation for shards connecting to the pylon.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMessagingShard
    Prototype class for shards offering messaging functionality, containing some general implementation-independent methods.
    AbstractNameBasedMessagingShard
    A simple extension of AbstractMessagingShard, which leaves to implement only AbstractMessagingShard.sendMessage(String, String, String) as an abstract method, and also the registration of a message receiver to the pylon.
    DefaultPylonImplementation
    Pylon for the default support infrastructure for agents.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractMessagingShard.MessagingDebug
    Debugging settings for messaging shards.
